page.title: 03Ebchester Village Trust
page.content: Ebchester Village Trust was formed in December 1976. This{"amenity"}society is non_political and self_funding. It's objectives are to{protect}the best features of the village and to improve the Ebchester environment generally. Occasional newsletters are distributed to every village household to keep all residents informed. Social events began to fund future projects. Some of these include:repairs to stepping stones, equipping the village playing field in Vindormora Road and producing a{historical booklet about {Ebchester. Starting life as an amenity society the Trust is perhaps best known for it's social activities which include regular dances, Christmas parties, discos for the younger members, family walks and outings, and an annual firework display.
